text: Does anyone have experience using webhooks to push HubSpot form data to an external server? I've only had luck changing the form action URL from HubSpot GUID to the Server URL.. however, this is not practical. Ideally I would like both servers to receive the data. <!here|@here>

Haven’t done this personally, but if you’re looking for a clean solution you could create a workflow that will post a webhook after the form is submitted. Wouldn’t be instant, but it could get the job done. If you need to do any formatting as well, check out <https://zapier.com/>
